title: Cocaine Bear
short_cast: Keri Russell, Alden Ehrenreich, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Ray Liotta, Isiah Whitlock Jr., Brooklynn Prince, Christian Convery, Margo Martindale, Jesse Tyler Ferguson
cast: Keri Russell, Alden Ehrenreich, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Ray Liotta, Isiah Whitlock Jr., Brooklynn Prince, Christian Convery, Margo Martindale, Jesse Tyler Ferguson
genre: Comedy Movies, Creature Features, Thriller Movies, US Movies
desc: Chaos and carnage ensue when a 500-pound black bear discovers — and devours — a discarded shipment of illegal narcotics in a national forest.
